overview.purpose: Define requirements and acceptance criteria for the public marketing landing page built with Next.js and Tailwind
overview.context: The landing page is composed from reusable sections in components/sections and rendered by app/page.tsx. Core UI primitives live in components/ui

business_goals: Generate qualified leads via primary CTA to app/contact/page.tsx
Showcase credibility using testimonials, case studies, and technology stack
Communicate services clearly with concise copy and scannable sections

technical: Interaction to Next Paint (INP) ≤ 200ms on 75th percentile mobile

in_scope: Hero with headline, subcopy, and primary CTA

target_audience.primary: Prospective B2B clients evaluating software partners
use_cases: Quickly scan offering, assess credibility, and contact sales
Explore case study highlights and stack alignment
Navigate to services and portfolio for deeper review

functional_requirements.requirement: Display headline text, supporting subheadline, and primary CTA button
details: Primary CTA button present and functional
CTA must be keyboard-focusable and announce destination

functional_requirements.requirement: Display at least 4 logo images with descriptive alt text
details: All logos have descriptive alt text

functional_requirements.requirement: Display 3-6 service cards with title, description, icon, and optional link
details: Cards are fully clickable and focusable

functional_requirements.requirement: Display grid/list of core technologies with badges or icons
details: Badges or icons for each technology
Tooltips or labels available for screen readers

functional_requirements.requirement: List primary industries served with brief descriptions
details: Optional anchor links to relevant case studies or services

functional_requirements.requirement: Highlight featured case study with KPI tiles and deep-link
Display carousel or list of 2-5 testimonials
details: Role and company for each testimonial

functional_requirements.requirement: Prominent CTA band with headline and button linking to /contact
details: Contrast ratio ≥ 4.5:1 between text and background

functional_requirements.requirement: Sticky top navigation with clear focus state and skip-to-content link
details: Links: Home, Services, Portfolio, Case Studies, About, Contact
Focus trap when mobile menu open

functional_requirements.requirement: Display company info, social links, copyright, and key page links
details: External links marked with rel='noopener noreferrer'
target='_blank' if used for external links

requirements: Visible focus styles on all interactive elements
Use next/image for images with static sizes
Preload primary webfont or use system font stack
No PII stored on the landing page
External scripts loaded with defer where possible

page_structure: The home route '/' renders without client-side errors or console warnings
Navigation is visible, sticky, and keyboard navigable
Skip link jumps to main content
Hero displays headline, subheadline, and a primary CTA linking to /contact
Social proof shows at least 4 logos with non-empty alt text
Services section displays at least 3 cards; each is clickable and focusable
Technology stack lists at least 6 technologies with accessible labels
Case study spotlight includes at least one KPI tile and deep-link to /case-studies/techflow
Testimonials contain at least 2 entries with names and roles
CTA section displays a button linking to /contact
Footer renders site links and copyright
accessibility: Tabbing from address bar lands on skip link; activating it jumps to main
All interactive elements have visible focus styles and accessible names
No axe-core violations of severity 'serious' or higher on the landing page
performance: On throttled mobile test (Fast 3G or 4G Slow), LCP ≤ 2.5s on p75
CLS remains ≤ 0.1 across hero and imagery; no late layout shifts on logo loads
seo: <title>, <meta name='description'>, OpenGraph, and Twitter Card present
One and only one <h1> present on the page
analytics: cta_click fires on hero CTA with location='hero' and correct path
service_card_click fires with service name for each card
Case study link click tracks case_study_click

functional_tests: Verify rendering of each section and primary navigation links
Validate CTA links and click events for analytics
Confirm responsive layout across breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop)
accessibility_tests: Keyboard traversal end-to-end; verify skip link and focus management
performance_tests: Lighthouse CI/DevTools: Ensure budgets for LCP/CLS/INP met
Verify image dimensions and next/image usage to prevent CLS

risks_and_mitigations.mitigation: Compress images, use static sizes, avoid blocking scripts

risks_and_mitigations.risk: Accessibility gaps in carousel or mobile menu
risks_and_mitigations.mitigation: Add focus traps, ARIA roles, and testing
Iterate with Marketing and run quick user tests
